text: isee prakaar, hamane aapako ek samudaay mein jisase pahale bahut-se samudaay guzar chuke hain rasool banaakar bheja hai, taaki aap unhen vo sandesh sunaen, jo hamane aapakee or vahî€¼yee dvaara bheja hai aur ve atyant krpaasheel ko asveekaar karate hain? aap kah den vahee mera paalanahaar hai, koee poojy nahin parantu vahee. mainne useepar bharosa kiya hai aur usee kee or mujhe jaana hai
